instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: LED Driver.
threads.message:
Is it possible to pull an LED Driver from a donor board? Being a BGA-type I've always used new.

Customer is being impatient and doesn't want to wait.

threads.title: LED Driver.
threads.message: If you reball it why wouldn't it. Tell him to GTFO and go to Apple, save yourself the headache of more idiotery.

threads.title: LED Driver.
threads.message:
I guess my question was more, is it worth the hassle, which you answered too.

Thanks Duke.
